name: Shopkeep (Cscopetski)
description:
Keybinds

Use WASD to move

Use E to interact

Tutorial Locate the chest where all your stock is and press E on it to get an item to stock.


Now find your closest shelf, and stock it by pressing E You can make upgrades to your shop by finding your closest upgrade station!

You have 60 seconds per day to stock all your shelves and acquire upgrades. Exponentially grow your shop until you reach enough gold to purchase the special item!

Story

You are a Goblin named Gobby, who owns a shop. Your goal is to acquire enough gold by selling items to buy Gobby a special item in as few days as possible.
